persona: Position 1 battery engineer balancing budget and solar backfeed
message: Your budget focus aligns well with prioritizing Slot 1 (20-21h), which consistently offers low tariffs while reducing strain on the network compared to later spikes. By focusing on Slot 1 and selectively using Slot 0 only when its price is significantly lower (Day 4), we minimize your cost while cooperating with Neighbor 2's transformer headroom goals, saving an estimated $0.15 and 5kg CO2 across the week.
